trans-unit.source: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: Deklarálja típusok betöltése a szerelvényeket, amelyek használják egy XAML olvasási vagy írási engedélyek.

trans-unit.source: XamlLoadPermission is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: XamlLoadPermission fontos forgatókönyvek használhatók, mint hogy belső típusok engedélyezettek a részlegesen megbízható kapcsolat betöltése.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using an enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> osztály használatával egy adott halmazát <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> értékeket.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with each `allowedAccess` entry as an item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Ez a konstruktor hívása inicializálja a <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>gyűjtemény minden `allowedAccess` bejegyzést egy elemet, és beállítja a visszatérési <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>a `false` létrehozott példányában.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Egy adott halmazát <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> értékeket.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess contained invalid information, such as a null item.
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessérvénytelen adatokat, például egy null elemet tartalmazott.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using existing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> osztály, meglévő jogosultságokkal sikeresen telepítették.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `true` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>Beállítja a visszatérési <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>való `true` létrehozott példányában.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Any call to this constructor sets the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection to `null` because it is not relevant if permissions are being reported rather than <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.
trans-unit.target: A konstruktor semmilyen hívásban beállítja a <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>gyűjteményt `null` mert nincs megfelelő engedélyek <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel> ahelyett hogy jelez-Ha</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref> számbavételi érték.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using a single <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> osztály egyetlen <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> érték.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with `allowedAccess` as the only item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Ez a konstruktor hívása inicializálja a <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>tartalmazó gyűjtemény `allowedAccess` csak elemként, és beállítja a visszatérési <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>való `false` létrehozott példány.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: The defining <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A definiáló <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> érték.

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values that this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a lista az összes <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> értékei, amelyhez a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> jelöli.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is initialized such that <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is `true`, AllowedAccess may be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha az aktuális <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>inicializálása úgy, hogy <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>van `true`, lehet, hogy AllowedAccess `null`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A read-only list of <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A csak olvasható listáját <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> értékeket, vagy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Tekintse meg a megjegyzés.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hoz létre, és visszaadja az aktuális azonos példányának <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Per the interface contract of <xref:System.Security.IPermission> this value is <xref:System.Security.IPermission> in the signature but can be cast to <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Az illesztő szerződés / <xref:System.Security.IPermission>Ez az érték <xref:System.Security.IPermission>aláírásában, de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> konvertálható</xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális másolatát <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruálja egy biztonsági objektumhoz, az XML-kódolás a megadott állapotú.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: Az XML-hozza létre újból a biztonsági objektum használandó kódolás.

trans-unit.source: elem is .
trans-unit.target: elemis .

trans-unit.source: elem does not contain the XML encoding for a .
trans-unit.target: elemaz XML-kódolás nem tartalmaz egy .

trans-unit.source: -or- The version attribute within elem is not supported.
trans-unit.target: – vagy – a version attribútum belül elem nem támogatott.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> includes a specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> in its <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*> list.
trans-unit.target: Értéket ad vissza e ez <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> tartalmazza a megadott <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> a saját <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>lista.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: The specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> to check for.
trans-unit.target: Az egyes <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"> </xref> kereséséhez.

trans-unit.source: if requestedAccess exists as an item in the list of the current .
trans-unit.target: Ha requestedAccess elem létezik a az aktuális listájának .

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: requestedAccess is null.
trans-unit.target: requestedAccessértéke null.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that is the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Hoz létre, és adja vissza egy <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> , amely az aktuális metszetét <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> és a megadott engedélyt.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: A union, intersect és részhalmaza logika <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>először be van jelölve, és előfordulhat, hogy vissza, hogy kizárólag alapján eredményt.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ezt követően <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>be van jelölve.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to intersect with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> a és a jelenlegi intersect <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális metszetét jelölő új engedély <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> és a megadott <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Ez az új engedély <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Ha metszetének üres.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogy az aktuális <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> a megadott engedéllyel részhalmaza.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: A union, intersect és részhalmaza logika <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>először be van jelölve, és előfordulhat, hogy vissza, hogy kizárólag alapján eredményt.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ezt követően <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>be van jelölve.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `target` is `null` and the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is both <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` and has an empty <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> list, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ha `target` van `null` és az aktuális <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>csak <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` , és egy üres <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>listában, ez a metódus visszaadja `true`.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Egy engedély, amely a részhalmaza kapcsolat tesztelése.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az aktuális <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> a megadott engedéllyel részhalmaza; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Vissza e ez <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> korlátlan engedélyeket jelöli.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> korlátlan engedélyeket jelöli.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> has specific access level restrictions in <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, or has no permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> rendelkezik-e speciális hozzáférési szint korlátozások <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, vagy nem rendelkezik engedéllyel.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Létrehoz egy XML-kódolás ezen <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> és a jelenlegi állapotában.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: Egy XML-kódolás ezen <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>, beleértve a semmilyen állapotra vonatkozó információt.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Hoz létre, amely a union, az aktuális engedély <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> és a megadott engedélyt.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: A union, intersect és részhalmaza logika <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>először be van jelölve, és előfordulhat, hogy vissza, hogy kizárólag alapján eredményt.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ezt követően <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>be van jelölve.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `other` is `null`, the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Ha `other` van `null`, az aktuális <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>adja vissza.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to combine with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> az aktuális egyesítenie <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that represents the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> , amely jelöli az Unió az aktuális <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> és a megadott <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>.
